results.definition: an artifact that is one of the individual parts of which a composite entity is made up; especially a part that can be separated from or attached to a system
examples: a component or constituent element of a system

results.definition: a member of a constituency; a citizen who is represented in a government by officials for whom he or she votes
examples: needs continued support by constituents to be re-elected

results.definition: something determined in relation to something that includes it
examples: he wanted to feel a part of something bigger than himself
I read a portion of the manuscript
the smaller component is hard to reach

results.definition: (grammar) a word or phrase or clause forming part of a larger grammatical construction

examples: jealousy was a component of his character
two constituents of a musical composition are melody and harmony
the grammatical elements of a sentence
a key factor in her success
humor: an effective ingredient of a speech

results.definition: constitutional in the structure of something (especially your physical makeup)
